body_html: Thanks, I have got it working in my debugger, though I have to manually edit the auto generated bazel test file because even though I make changes to kernel_tests/control_flow_ops_test.py before i run "bazel test //tensorflow/python:control_flow_ops_py_test", the generated file in bazel-bin/tensorflow/python/control_flow_ops_py_test.runfiles/tensorflow/python/kernel_tests/control_flow_ops_test.py doesn't include my changes (this seems to be the only file that isn't a symlink). Maybe this is a different bug?
